actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from the Department of VeteransAffairs and Office of Management and Budget.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to ensure that all veterans eligible to receive educational assistance under the Veterans' Educational Assistance Program have 10 years after discharge or release from active duty in which to pursue a program of education with such assistance.

summary.text: Repeals a provision which terminates Federal veterans' educational assistance as of December 31, 1989.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to ensure that all veterans eligible to receive educational assistance under the Veterans' Educational Assistance Program have 10 years after discharge or release from active duty in which to pursue a program of education with such assistance.
